name: Renegadeklingon
tagline: A game prototype using lua and love framework
body:
RenegadeKlingon
===============

Creating a love2d and lua based game just for fun, need to return back to arcade games. RenegadeKlingon is a r-type style game,
it is under construction now.

ScreenShoots
============

![Screen1](https://raw.github.com/AngelAppentra/RenegadeKlingon/master/ScreenShots/Screen_Shoot1.png)
![Screen2](https://raw.github.com/AngelAppentra/RenegadeKlingon/master/ScreenShots/Screen_Shoot2.png)

Videos
===========

[First Prototype Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3EbIkcEqlY)

Download It
===========

You can try it for free, browse the code or report a bug using the issues.
Download the lastest game release from the releases page:

https://github.com/AngelBaltar/RenegadeKlingon/releases

For more Instructions see linux, windows and mac sections.
This Game is developed and tested for **Love 0.9.1**. 

Linux
===========
For linux this game needs love2d system, a single .love file is provided , to play the game you only need 
to download that zip file, uncompress it, go to the directory linux and execute RenegadeKlingon.love with love2d.

If you don't know love2d check it at:

https://love2d.org/

(Remember that this game runs with **love 0.9.1**)

You can find all love releases at:

https://bitbucket.org/rude/love/downloads

Install it and you will be able to play this game following the previous instructions.

Windows
===========
For windows a simple .exe is provided in windows zip


Mac osx
===========
For Mac there is a simple .app provided in mac zip


Need Help
==========

This is my first game, I am a programmer learning lua and love2d, no problems with it that is the easy part but I am not used to create graphics,
sprites ...

If you are a graphic designer and want to contribute you are welcome, contact mee in github creating a issue or leaving a comment
